verses.verse: When I would have healed <WH7495> <WH8800> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, then the iniquity <WH5771> of Efrayim <WH669> was discovered <WH1540> <WH8738>, and the wickedness <WH7451> of SHomron <WH8111>: for they commit <WH6466> <WH8804> falsehood <WH8267>; and the thief <WH1590> cometh in <WH935> <WH8799>, and the troop <WH1416> of robbers spoileth <WH6584> <WH8804> without <WH2351>.

And they consider <WH559> <WH8799> not in their hearts <WH3824> that I remember <WH2142> <WH8804> all their wickedness <WH7451>: now their own doings <WH4611> have beset them about <WH5437> <WH8804>; they are before my face <WH6440>.
They make the king <WH4428> glad <WH8055> <WH8762> with their wickedness <WH7451>, and the princes <WH8269> with their lies <WH3585>.

They are all adulterers <WH5003> <WH8764>, as an oven <WH8574> heated <WH1197> <WH8802> by the baker <WH644> <WH8802>, who ceaseht <WH7673> <WH8799> from raising <WH5782> <WH8800> after he hath kneaded <WH3888> <WH8800> the dough <WH1217>, until it be leavened <WH2556> <WH8800>.

In the day <WH3117> of our king <WH4428> the princes <WH8269> have made him sick <WH2470> <WH8689> with bottles <WH2534> of wine <WH3196>; he stretched out <WH4900> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> with scorners <WH3945> <WH8802>.

For they have made ready <WH7126> <WH8765> their heart <WH3820> like an oven <WH8574>, whiles they lie in wait <WH693> <WH8800>: their baker <WH644> <WH8802> sleepeth <WH3463> all the night <WH3915>; in the morning <WH1242> it burneth <WH1197> <WH8802> as a flaming <WH3852> fire <WH784>.

They are all hot <WH2552> <WH8735> as an oven <WH8574>, and have devoured <WH398> <WH8804> their judges <WH8199> <WH8802>; all their kings <WH4428> are fallen <WH5307> <WH8804>: there is none among them that calleth <WH7121> <WH8802> unto me.
Efrayim <WH669>, he hath mixed <WH1101> <WH8704> himself among the people <WH5971>; Efrayim <WH669> is a cake <WH5692> not turned <WH2015> <WH8803>.

Strangers <WH2114> <WH8801> have devoured <WH398> <WH8804> his strength <WH3581>, and he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> it not: yea, gray hairs <WH7872> are here and there <WH2236> <WH8804> upon him, yet he knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> not.

And the pride <WH1347> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> testifieth <WH6030> <WH8804> to his face <WH6440>: and they do not return <WH7725> <WH8804> to the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, nor seek <WH1245> <WH8765> him for all this.
Efrayim <WH669> also is like a silly <WH6601> <WH8802> dove <WH3123> without heart <WH3820>: they call <WH7121> <WH8804> to Egypt <WH4714>, they go <WH1980> <WH8804> to Ashur <WH804>.

When they shall go <WH3212> <WH8799>, I will spread <WH6566> <WH8799> my net <WH7568> upon them; I will bring them down <WH3381> <WH8686> as the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>; I will chastise <WH3256> <WH8686> them, as their congregation <WH5712> hath heard <WH8088>.

Woe <WH188> unto them! for they have fled <WH5074> <WH8804> from me: destruction <WH7701> unto them! because they have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> against me: though I have redeemed <WH6299> <WH8799> them, yet they have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> lies <WH3577> against me.

And they have not cried <WH2199> <WH8804> unto me with their heart <WH3820>, when they howled <WH3213> <WH8686> upon their beds <WH4904>: they assemble <WH1481> <WH8709> themselves for corn <WH1715> and wine <WH8492>, and they rebel <WH5493> <WH8799> against me.
Though I have bound <WH3256> <WH8765> and strengthened <WH2388> <WH8765> their arms <WH2220>, yet do they imagine <WH2803> <WH8762> mischief <WH7451> against me.

They return <WH7725> <WH8799>, but not to Ha `Elyon <WH5920>: they are like a deceitful <WH7423> bow <WH7198>: their princes <WH8269> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by the sword <WH2719> for the rage <WH2195> of their tongue <WH3956>: this <WH2097> shall be their derision <WH3933> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
